title: Practitioner
description: A person with a formal responsibility in the provisioning of healthcare or related services.(Based on HL7 FHIR Release 5 specifications)

fhir:identifier.title: Identifier
fhir:identifier.description: An identifier for the person as this agent.

fhir:active.title: Active
fhir:active.description: Indicates whether the  Practitioner's record is in active use.

fhir:name.title: Name
fhir:name.description: The name(s) associated with the practitioner.

fhir:telecom.title: Contact Details
fhir:telecom.description: A contact detail for the practitioner (that apply to all roles).

fhir:birthDate.title: Birth Date
fhir:birthDate.description: The date of birth for the practitioner.

fhir:deceasedBoolean.title: Deceased Indicator
fhir:deceasedBoolean.description: Indicates if the practitioner is deceased or not.

fhir:deceasedDateTime.title: Deceased Date Time
fhir:deceasedDateTime.description: Date Time if the practitioner is deceased or not.

fhir:address.title: Address
fhir:address.description: Address(es) of the practitioner that are not role specific (typically home address).

fhir:qualification.title: Qualification
fhir:qualification.description: Qualifications, certifications, accreditations, licenses, training, etc. pertaining to the provision of care.

xdm:identifier.title: Identifier
xdm:identifier.description: An identifier for this qualification for the practitioner.

xdm:period.title: Period
xdm:period.description: Period during which the qualification is valid.

xdm:issuer.title: Issuer
xdm:issuer.description: Organization that regulates and issues the qualification.

fhir:communication.title: Communication
fhir:communication.description: A language which may be used to communicate with the practitioner.

xdm:language.title: Language
xdm:language.description: The language code used to communicate with the practitioner.
